isMongoId: The {campo} must be a mongo id.
isEmail: The {campo} must be a valid email address.
equals: The {campo} must be equal to other thing.
isAlphanumeric: The {campo} may only contain letters and numbers.
isAscii: The {campo} may only contain ASCII chars.
isBase64: The {campo} mush be a base64 string.
isBefore: The {campo} must be a date earlier
isBoolean: The {campo} field must be true or false.
isCreditCard: The {campo} must be a credit card number.
isCurrency: The {campo} must be a valid currency amount.
isDataURI: The {campo} must be a data uri format.
isDivisibleBy: The {campo} must be dividible by other number.
isFQDN: The {campo} must be a fully qualified domain name.
isHexColor: The {campo} must be a hexadecimal color.
isISBN: The {campo} must be a valid ISBN string.
